problem_summary_simple: Find the latest valid 24-hour time using four given digits exactly once.
problem_summary_technical: Generates all permutations of the four digits, forms HH:MM, validates against 24-hour format, and returns the lexicographically largest valid time.
key_insights: The problem is constrained to 4 digits, making brute-force permutations feasible.
Sorting the digits in descending order and checking permutations from largest to smallest ensures the first valid time found is the maximum.
Careful validation of hours (0-23) and minutes (0-59) is essential.
